casebody.data:
98-3083 (La. 4/1/99)

STATE ex rel. John L. SMITH v. STATE of Louisiana. No. 98-KH-3083. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Smith, John L.; — Plaintiffs); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writ; Parish of East Baton Rouge 19th Judicial District Court Div. “G” Number 8-79-461

Denied.

JOHNSON, J. not on panel.
